event.descr:
The interface %interface% generated a syslog message.
Node ID: %nodeid%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Syslog severity: %parm[severity]%
OpenNMS severity: %severity%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg:
An OpenWrt sysinit syslog message has been received

Message: %parm[process]%: %parm[syslogmessage]%
